review_data.title: Très bonne adresse
review_data.content: Tapas et sangria très bon. Personnel sympa. Bonne adresse pour un apéro en fin de journée par une grosse chaleur.

review_data.title: Great local hang with karaoke
review_data.content: Super fun local bar with a great karaoke setup. Large karaoke playlist selection. Come to blow off steam after work or to hang on a weekend.

review_data.title: Spanish drinks and snacks
review_data.content: The Toro Bar in the rowdy nightlife area of Zürich serves authentic Spanish wine, beer and Tapas. They also sell tapas to take home. The services is friendly and the prices are moderate to Swiss standards. It is a little bit hot inside.

review_data.title: Nice karaoke nights on Thursdays
review_data.content: A very nice spanish bar, serving tapas and nice snack food as well as good biers, from Switzerland and Belgium also. Prices are quite good for Zurich. And a good atmosphere at the karaoke night that they organize every Thursday. I really enjoyed my time...More

review_data.title: Wine, tapas, karaoke and parties
review_data.content: Been there often and for me best wine selection and best tapas in town. Fun with friends after work or different parties on the weekend!!

review_data.title: Tapas place
review_data.content: Been there after the street parade and the place was really busy. Had a few tapas while drinking and they were really nice. Will go there again.

review_data.title: Spanish tapas
review_data.content: They offer a wide variety of tapas and wines at Toro's. It is a lively tapas bar where many go to watch football. Also their wine selection is good. Good place to have a glass of red wine with tapas.
